abstract: It has been a tough season for many people connected to quarterbacks in the Southeastern Conference.
snippet: It has been a tough season for many people connected to quarterbacks in the Southeastern Conference.
lead_paragraph: ATLANTA -- Take any typical quarterback in the Southeastern Conference and there is a decent chance that he had a opportunity to play professional baseball because of his strong arm, but was instead drawn to football by the allure of the big crowds in the SEC.

headline.main: It's Not Easy for SEC Quarterbacks
